title: HPI 25 - Communication Breakdown - Bhartrihari on Language
itunes:title: HPI 25 - Communication Breakdown - Bhartrihari on Language
description: The grammarian Bhartṛhari argues that the study of language is the path to liberation, because the undivided reality underlying language is brahman.
content:encoded: The grammarian Bhartṛhari argues that the study of language is the path to liberation, because the undivided reality underlying language is brahman.
